amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for fiscal years 2006 adn 2007 for the United States Coast Guard, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2344 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2344 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S12036) To authorize appropriations for fiscal years 2006 adn 2007 for the United States Coast Guard, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2344 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Inouye.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2344 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
